column4: i just got a new laptop and it came with windows 7 , im thinking of installling ubuntu onto my external hard drive and run it that way  what about wubi install would that be a better way than installing on external hd ??
if i go the external hd rout will it act just like a normal hard drive install i can save files and download and it saves?
its about performance, which hard drive is faster.. thats my opinion
sometimes manufacturers leave backup partitions with a bios that allows you to restore it to normal when pressed
